further charge after fatal bike crash .

we 'll be back with more updates at 08:00 on monday .

documents.title: cancer boy told drug 'will not help '
text: cancer boy told drug 'will not help '

documents.title: five charged in human trafficking investigation
text: five people arrested in derby earlier this week have been charged with modern slavery and human trafficking offences .
the three men and two women appeared at southern derbyshire magistrates ' court today and have been remanded in custody .
another woman - also arrested during the operation - has been released under investigation .
the arrests were made after derbyshire police officers executed warrants at rutland street , st james road , balaclava road and patmore square .
they found ten men from latvia , who officers believe to be victims of human trafficking .
author: Amy Woodfield
BBC Local Live

documents.title: firearm used in attempted robbery
text: staff at a shop in evington in leicester have reported being threatened by a man with a firearm .
police were called at about 11:30 yesterday to the co-op in main street .
they 've said a man eventually fled empty-handed and no-one was injured .
author: Amy Woodfield
BBC Local Live

documents.title: viljoen 's 15 wickets help derbyshire win
text: viljoen 's 15 wickets help derbyshire win

documents.title: crash causing delays near fosse park
text: fosse park accident on soar valley way towards lutterworth rd between the everards rbt and the canal bridge svw is partially blocked
@ twitterid
just come past .
avoid if you can .
author: Amy Woodfield
BBC Local Live

documents.title: freshers ' week 'slave night ' offends
text: freshers ' week 'slave night ' offends

documents.title: airbus set for trials after rolls-royce fixes engine problem
text: airbus is set to start long-distance trials for its newest passenger plane after engine maker rolls-royce fixed a problem that had disrupted flight testing .
an asian tour , designed to test reliability of the a350-1000 , was postponed after engineers discovered a problem with its trent xwb-97 engines developed in derby .
the problem affected a part attached to the combustor inside the engine .
we are working closely with airbus to support their plans to begin functional and reliability testing in the coming weeks , having addressed a quality finding in an engine component . ''
author: Reuters

documents.title: man arrested after schoolgirls approached
text: a man has been arrested in connection with two incidents in west bridgford described by police as `` sus
a spokesman for nottinghamshire police said two girls , aged 11 and 15 , were asked to get into a man 's car as they walked home from school .
one girl was approached at about 15:20 on ascott gardens on 5 september , and the other incident occurred at the junction of greythorne and waddington drive at about 15:10 the following day .
author: Liam Barnes
BBC News Online

documents.title: pears beat foxes to climb above notts
text: pears beat foxes to climb above notts

documents.title: motorcyclist in fatal crash named
text: the motorcyclist who died in a crash on wollaton road on wednesday night has been named by police .
ben gilson , from pyatt street in the meadows , collided with another bike at the junction with eton grove at about 23:30 .
the 26-year-old was pronounced dead at the scene .
nottinghamshire police said two men , aged 20 and 24 , have been arrested on sus of causing death by dangerous driving .
author: Liam Barnes
BBC News Online

documents.title: knife charge after college 'locked down '
text: a teenager 's been charged with carrying a knife in public after an incident this week outside burton college which saw the site `` locked down '' .
a spokeperson for the college says nobody was hurt on tuesday and they quickly got back to normal after the police arrived just after 13:00 .
staffordshire police today said a 17-year-old male from burton 's been charged with possession of a knife in a public place .
after an incident at burton college on tues 12 sep , a 17yr-old man from burton has been charged with possession of a knife in a public place
author: Allen Cook
BBC Local Live

documents.title: watch : flying scotsman visits east midlands
text: the flying scotsman has been passing through our neighbourhood this afternoon .
this photo was taken by josh cook who saw the train at loughborough station .
stapleford railway caught this footage of the train accelerating out of melton mowbray after stopping off on its way to york .
author: Amy Woodfield
BBC Local Live

documents.title: cricket : worcestershire chase victory target
text: worcester are chasing a victory target of 132 in their game against leicestershire at new road - a win could put them top .
you can follow all the action on bbc hereford & worcester 's 738am frequency and online .
author: Dave Bradley
Cricket commentator

documents.title: early look at rail freight hub
text: i 'm getting a first look on-site at east midlands gateway - it 's huge .
it will be a distribution and a rail hub due in a few years .
author: Chris Doidge
BBC Radio Derby, political reporter

documents.title: students face paxman in tv quiz
text: four students from leicester are going to appear on the bbc tv show that makes most of us feel very stupid - university challenge .
pip brown , stanley french , graham aldred and jamie byrne from the university of leicester will feature on the programme scheduled to air on 18 september .
they 'll have a lot to live up to - the university had the first ever winning team in 1963 .
author: Amy Woodfield
BBC Local Live

documents.title: chance of terror attacks succeeding is 'low ' , says expert
text: the parsons green station explosion that has injured at least 22 people shows the chance of terrorists succeeding in causing significant damage is low , according to a university of nottingham academic .

we all understand that this is an attempt to get at us all , to terrify us , but what we have to do is to accept that thankfully that the chances of these maniacs - and i use that word advisedly - succeeding is low .
afzal ashraf , a visiting fellow at the university 's centre for conflict and terrorism , said his daughter was in a train behind the one with the explosive device .
he said it is `` very fortunate '' nobody seems to have been seriously hurt , and believes cctv from the area will mean a suspect could be identified or even arrested `` in the next few hours '' .

dr ashraf said the uk has `` some of the best '' counter terror and security systems in the world , which has kept the threat low , but said there was a need to `` look at the global political situation which feeds the motivation for these horrible incidents '' .
author: BBC News Channel

documents.title: elderly woman 'assaulted ' in baslow
text: derbyshire police say they are investigating an alleged assault on an 81-year-old woman in baslow .
a man claiming to work for age uk is said to have approached her at her home on bubnell lane between 10:30 and 11:10 on thursday .
he is then said to have grabbed her , causing a cut to her arm .
a police spokesman said age uk confirmed the man - believed to be in his 70s and driving a silver car with `` a weird-shaped roof '' - did not work for them .
author: Liam Barnes
BBC News Online

documents.title: passengers on diverted flight set to take off
text: passengers on a ryanair flight that had to perform an emergency landing at east midlands airport are due to depart for their original destination soon .
a spokesman for the airport said they 're set to leave for copenhagen at 13:46 .
the boeing 737 set off from stansted at 08:07 , and landed at east midlands at about 10:15 .
it was towed off the runway and the area was cleared an by 11:15 .
east midlands airport said disruption to other services was `` minimal '' , with one incoming flight forced to divert to birmingham airport to refuel before it arrived in east midlands .
author: Liam Barnes
BBC News Online

documents.title: 'annoyed ' customer failed in blackmail bid
text: 'annoyed ' customer failed in blackmail bid

documents.title: water supply interruptions in derby
text: repair work on cambridge street in derby is causing some water supplies to be off or at low pressure according to severn trent .
some customers in # de23 may be experiencing supply interruptions while we carry out a repair , please see link
author: Amy Woodfield
BBC Local Live

documents.title: afternoon weather update
text: a cooler day with brighter intervals and showers .
a few of the showers during the afternoon could be heavy .
maximum temperature : 16c ( 61f ) .
author: Sara Blizzard
BBC Weather

documents.title: first salmon found in river since industrial revolution
text: atlantic salmon have been discovered in the river ecclesbourne for the first time in about 250 years .

the environment agency claim the discovery of juvenile salmon in the tributary of the river derwent comes following the installation of fish passes that help the fish move upstream through the river .
it said during the industrial revolution poor water quality and weirs acted as a barrier to fish migration leaving them stuck in unsuitable water .
we are , for the first time ever , witnessing a recovering population of salmon on the river derwent and other local rivers which is an excellent result . ''
author: Amy Woodfield
BBC Local Live

documents.title: leicester tigers announce team to face gloucester
text: the welford road side have had a tough start to the new season , but the tigers will be hoping to up their first win at the third time of asking .
this is the team to face gloucester tomorrow .
team named | your tigers side for tomorrow 's return home to welford road for our clash with gloucester rugby .
# leivglo
should be an awesome game , look forward to it !
i forgot to mention come on you # glaws
we wo n't discourage any rugby fan supporting their team !
wells & maksimyw looks an interesting change ( injury to fitzgerald ) .
ca n't wait !
kitch out injured too .
i thought he might be .
pleased for the youngsters , but would have put croft in the 23 .
i 'm pleased to see mapapalangi is being given a chance , albeit from the bench .
please sub when it will make a difference , not w 5min to go .
nice pic of gengey !
will evans injured ?
# outandout7
do you know if regent college @ twitterid will be open for parking this season please ?
thanks
unfortunately , parking this season is unavailable .
sorry for any inconvenience caused .
thanks for letting me know .
dice rolled
glad to see a change in the second-row , despite being down to injuries .
line-out has been a real concern in the first two matches .
# leivglo
seriously worried about the strength of this team .
injuries killing us again but desperate that they win !
hamilton is a solid player but it 's worrying we do n't have a better option to come in at 7 .
we keep letting all our best loose forwards go .
author: BBC Sport

documents.title: air crash investigators sent to airport
text: investigators from the air accidents investigation branch have been sent to east midlands airport , where a plane made an emergency landing after losing a wheel .
traffic was held on the nearby m1 motorway while the jet landed .
the flight from stansted to copenhagen was diverted soon after taking off .
in a statement , ryanair said the aircraft `` landed safely '' and passengers were being put onto another flight .
author: Liam Barnes
BBC News Online

documents.title: county ins & outs 2017
text: county ins & outs 2017

documents.title: motorway traffic held for emergency landing
text: the emergency landing at east midlands airport has had an impact on traffic in the area .
vehicles are being temporarily held on the m1 northbound between j23a and j24 .
author: Amy Woodfield
BBC Local Live

documents.title: derby county prepare to face 'good side '
text: gary rowett has been talking to the media ahead of derby county 's trip to bristol city tomorrow .
he said they face a `` good side '' who are `` bright '' and `` athletic . ''
when it comes to george thorne the rams boss said it was important for him to get back out there but he 's still a long way off .
author: BBC Derby Sport

documents.title: hot stuff ? union goes full monty in support of strikes
text: a nakedly political statement , anyone ?
it 's 20 years since the full monty was released , and one of its most famous scenes has inspired an unusual message of support .
members of unite community chesterfield have re-enacted the dancing job centre queue , which they say is to back striking pcs workers at eastern avenue jobcentre in sheffield .
donna summer 's hot stuff provides the soundtrack , so do you 'feel love ' for the video , or do you think 'enough is enough ' ?
author: Liam Barnes
BBC News Online

documents.title: emergency landing after plane loses wheel
text: a flight between stansted and copenhagen had to make an emergency landing at east midlands airport earlier .
ryanair has said is was because the plane lost of one of its two nose wheels after take-off .
a spokesperson said : `` the aircraft landed safely in east midlands , customers disembarked and will board a replacement aircraft shortly . ''
author: Amy Woodfield
BBC Local Live

documents.title: towers to remain at former hospital site
text: both of the `` pepper pot '' towers at the former derbyshire royal infirmary have been saved from demolition .
derby 's planning committee has agreed that hundreds of homes can be built around them but they did have to persuade the developers to keep both towers .
the council has only given outline permission so far meaning it 's approved the principle of building homes , offices and shops .
it 's still got to tick off what the houses should look like , how many car parking spaces there should be - those sort of things .
author: Chris Doidge
BBC Radio Derby, political reporter

documents.title: mobility scooter users sought for safety project
text: do you use a mobility scooter or know anyone who does ?
nottingham trent university is developing a new training video to improve road safety , and is looking for vehicle owners to get in touch .
according to the university there were nine fatal accidents involving mobility scooters in england and wales in 2014 .
more than 300,000 people already use the vehicles , and the number of users is expected to rise up to 10 % per year .
author: Liam Barnes
BBC News Online

documents.title: crash scene camera catches nearly 400 in a week
text: nearly 400 fines have been handed out to drivers in the first week of a new camera being installed outside leicester railway station .
- close to where a cyclist was killed .
before 5 september , the bus stop outside the station was patrolled by enforcement officers .
now a 24-hour camera with automatic number plate recognition ( anpr ) covers the corner of station street to the corner of conduit street .
only buses and hackney cabs can pull over in the bus stop - something hundreds of drivers have ignored so far .
they now face fines of £ 70 ( or £ 35 if paid within 21 days ) .
the installation of the camera follows a fatal crash in july 2016 where cyclist sam boulton was knocked into the path of a moving van .
author: Amy Woodfield
BBC Local Live

documents.title: weather watchers : here comes the sun
text: the weather 's taken a turn for the worse , but before the clouds and the cold there were some lovely sunrises across the east midlands this morning .
emmyloo took this stunning shot of vibrant pinks and purples across east bridgford , while orange was the order of the day for anne in brailsford .
it was also a clear start to the day for mogjo , judging by their from birstall .
author: BBC Weather Watchers

documents.title: born again ! church returns to service after 30 years
text: three decades ago it became a shopping arcade , then it was an oriental restaurant , but on sunday it 'll re-open once again as a church .
the dicoese of derby is resurrecting st werburgh 's on friargate to try to attract more young people .
rev phil mann , lead minister at st werburgh 's , said a lot of the modern furnishings from its restaurant days have been ripped out , but old features will remain .
there 's a real excitement and a buzz that this is being brought back to its intended purpose as a church , so we 're really excited to see what will happen .
author: BBC Radio Derby

documents.title: watch : hedgehogs help family through prickly time
text: a family from thorpe astley have chosen an unusual way of getting though a difficult time in their life .
when andy whitfield was made redundant twice in two years and his son was diagnosed with autism it pushed him into depression .
then andy and his family set up a hedgehog sanctuary .

it all started with just two disabled hedgehogs that the andy and his wife alison got to help them deal with a slug issue in their garden - now they have a garage full of the spiky animals needing help .
the couple has used social media to raise money so they can keep caring for hedgehogs .
however the sanctuary has also had a positive affect on them .
andy said : `` these guys have helped us through quite a lot . ''
author: Amy Woodfield
BBC Local Live

documents.title: trams back in service after crash
text: tram services are now back in service after a crash on the lines at the end of wilford bridge .
the tram has been moved , allowing services to continue , but a silver audi is still at the side of the road with a huge dent in the back of the vehicle .
the impact was severe enough to knock the wheel back into the main body of the car , while a pedestrian crossing has also been knocked to one side .
trams are now running again past meadows embankment over the bridge , but this is what happens when your car collides with one @ twitterid
author: Christian Hewgill
Reporter, BBC Radio Nottingham

documents.title: cricket : foxes face tough final day at worcester
text: leicestershire face an uphill battle on the final day of their county championship match at worcestershire .
the foxes will resume the final day on 111 for seven - leading by just 22 runs .
they reckon they 'll need to build a lead of at least 150 to make a game of it .
author: BBC Leicester Sport

documents.title: tram disruption following 'crash '
text: here 's another photo from the suspected tram crash between wilford village and meadows embankment .
tram operator net said tickets and passes for this service are being accepted on other lines .
technicians are on site working to remove the tram .
author: Amy Woodfield
BBC Local Live

documents.title: tram 'crashed into a car '
text: there is disruption to the nottingham tram service this morning .
according to messages and photos on social media , a tram has crashed into a car .
we have no service between queens walk & wilford lane due to a road traffic accident apologies for any inconvenience caused to your journey
any updates
1/3 we have no service between queens walk and wilford lane due to a road traffic accident at meadows embankment .
here we go again some idiotic car driver .
hope they are prosecuted and the tram and paggengers sue them for damages and lost earnings
author: Amy Woodfield
BBC Local Live

documents.title: adam johnson death : mother felt 'disbelief '
text: the mother of 12 year-old adam johnson has been speaking to the bbc about the moment she found out her son had died .
adam fell through the roof of a derelict factory in chester green last weekend and then died in hospital .
she said the last time she spoke to her son was by text message about a sleep over - shortly after she got a knock on the door from the police .
author: Amy Woodfield
BBC Local Live

text: leicestershire :
nottinghamshire :
derbyshire :
author: BBC News Travel

documents.title: today 's weather forecast
text: after a rather chilly start to friday , it will be bright with a chance of one or two showers .
author: Sara Blizzard
BBC Weather

documents.title: man groomed and abused nine-year-old
text: a man has been jailed for six years for grooming and sexually abusing a nine-year-old girl .
graham shelbourne from edwinstowe befriended the girl and bought her gifts before sexually assaulting her , nottingham crown court heard .

the 52-year-old , of newbery close , was found guilty of sexually assaulting a girl under 13 by touching , attempting to sexually assault a girl under 13 by touching and inciting a girl under 13 to engage in sexual activity .

documents.title: join us for today 's live news coverage
text: good morning east midlands - i 'll be writing your live page today along with liam barnes .
we 'll have all the latest news , sport , weather and travel from across the region .
if you 'd like to get in touch with us you can send an email or use facebook or twitter .
author: Amy Woodfield
BBC Local Live
